actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday of May of each year as "National Grandparents' Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the fourth Sunday of May of each year "National Grandparents' Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday of May of each year as "National Grandparents' Day".
